Scene:
The Bottom of the Ravin
(Tanisoko / 谷底)

Play: The Adachi Plain in Oshu (奥州安達原)

Production: February 1973



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Aioidayū IV (see also Takemoto Aikodayū I) (竹本相生大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))



Performers:

Puppeteer Character Kashira
Kiritake Itchō
(桐竹一暢) 		Lady-in-waiting Kushige, in fact Yoshimitsu
(匣の内侍実は新羅三郎義光) 		Musume
(娘)
Yoshida Kotama (see also Yoshida Bungo V)
(吉田小玉) 		Drug peddler, in fact Kagemasa
(薬売り実は鎌倉権五郎) 		Oniwaka
(鬼若)
Yoshida Tamao
(吉田玉男) 		Iwate
(老女岩手) 		Bakuya
(莫耶)
Toyomatsu Seijūrō IV
(豊松清十郎 (四)) 		Ikomanosuke
(志賀崎生駒之助) 		Wakaotoko
(若男)
Yoshida Minotarō (see also Kiritake Kanjūrō)
(吉田蓑太郎) 		Traveller
(旅の男) 		Hanaugoki
(鼻動き)
Yoshida Tamame
(吉田玉女) 		Prince Tamaki, in fact Yatsuwaka
(環の宮実は義家一子八若) 		Koyaku
(子役)
Kiritake Kamematsu IV
(桐竹亀松 (四)) 		Noriuji, in fact Sadato
(桂中納言則氏実は安倍貞任) 		Bunshichi
(文七)
